api mihithalaye sampath walin pamana ikmawa nayata gannawun bawata pathwa sitimu.ee naya dada poliyath samanga aya kara gannata bari wu wita thawakalika samawa wanne apa sobadaham mathawa wisin apa pita muda harima yi.ee sambandhayen amarika eksath janapada aanduwata idiripath karannata prayogika yojana kipayak atha.enam yali yalith aarthika tharagaya thiwra karannata pora badanawata wada nawa sadacharathmaka shikshanayak saha alpechcha santhushtidayaka jiwana kramayak handunwa dennata salasum kirima yi.amarikanu aanduwa eda ruswelt janadhipathi yugaye samaja ha aarthika prathisanskarana pilibanda nawa salasum kramayata samana mahajana karyasadhaka wyapruthi gana sakachcha karamin siti.

ostreliyawata erehiwa hobart nuwara pawathi test tharagaye shri lanka palamu inime di ostreliyanu wegapandu yawana kridaka pitar sidl panduwa paludu kirimak sidukala bawata kisidu sakshiyak nomathi bawa prakasha kala tharaga thiraka kris brod ee sambandhawa thawaduratath katayuthu nokarana bawa sandahan kaleya.shri lanka kalamanakarithwaya edina tharagaye rupawahini widiyo pataya narambaime di sidl panduwa paludu kala bawata saka kerena darshanayak hethuwen shri lanka pile kalamanakaru charith senanayaka anthar jathika krikat sammelanaye niladharinta ee pilibandawa pawasa atha.namuth ema widiyo pataya narambau kris brod pawasa sitiye in ewannak pilibimbau nowana bawaya.rupawahiniya magin ema siduwima dakima harennata shri lanka pilata me sambandhawa kisidu sakshiyak nomathi bawa mahela wadi duratath kiweya.me athara siya pandu yawannanta sahaya pala karana ostreliyanu nayaka mayikal klak thama kandayama kridawe jiwagunaya aaraksha karaganimin krida kala bawata wishwasaya palakaleya.
